CHAT.comment: Before taping began , QU and his mom had been playing in the upstairs playhouse , and subsequently came down. SI goes upstairs; EL is on the stairs

u.a: screams loudly , jumps up and down when he sees SI upstairs
EL reaches the playhouse room
swings arm at EL
SI and EL come to edge of playhouse to watch
MA approaches QU
points to downstairs where QM is sitting
QU enters downstairs and sits with his mom at table; MA goes over to turn upstairs light on; SI and EL watch her
MA leaves area; SI and EL begin playing; SI puts on headband , then EL and SI go downstairs and leave area; QU and QM leave area; QM goes over and talks to other moms
grabs her hand and pulls her to downstairs playhouse while QM is still talking; they enter playhouse; QU picks up a scarf
picks up a backpack
QM starts talking again with other moms and dads
QU stands in QM's line of sight as she talks to other parents

QU goes over to cupboard and gets a cup; he puts it in the backpack; CO goes upstairs , puts doll in doll's bed , and leaves; QU and QM pack the backpack with utensils and things; QM talks a lot to QU , but it is very faint; QM stands up with her coffee cup and QU puts on backpack; QU starts going to block area
points to drawing table
begins drawing
QU draws for a while; QM watches
QM bends down and they kiss
QM leaves; QU leaves area after playing alone for a while; KE and AN approach playhouse area; KE has a doll
calls across room
they make eye contact with EM , then turn around and go upstairs; KE stops
AN turns around , but then continues upstairs
follows AN upstairs; KE is carrying two dolls
to doll
AN and KE laugh; AN tries to take her sweater off , KE rummages through basket for doll clothes
KE goes downstairs; AN , still trying to take sweater off , goes to top of stairs just as KE comes back with another doll
puts doll down on table
the girls giggle and play for a bit
LA calls from across the room downstairs
points to place where she got her doll earlier

KE and AN go downstairs to place where dolls are; they get another doll and carry it out of area; QU , who has been playing downstairs , runs upstairs with frying pan and goes to stove; he plays for a while; KE , AN , JS , and LA come back into area and go upstairs
QU doesn't say anything; the girls come up
JS starts messing with the phone and chairs
JS stops; JS and LA go back downstairs; CO comes up; AN and QU bang stove/cabinet door
QU goes downstairs alone; comes back with backpack and shows AN and KE
AM leaves
KE and AN watch QU present the backpack and they all inspect it for a bit
holds backpack; AN ignores; KE goes downstairs; AN and QU follow; KE and AN come back up; QU comes back upstairs , shows AN his backpack
high pitch
high pitch
KE and CO leave
holds up his backpack
QU and AN head for the stairs and go down; AN , KE , and CO come back upstairs; AM follows; QU is at bottom of steps
AM comes upstairs; QU comes up after minute
shows AM her name tag; KE watches
QU goes downstairs; KE picks up doll from CO and turns away from conversation
to snap fingers
snaps her fingers
QU comes back upstairs , grabs a doll and holds it up to the girls
AN and AM briefly look up
snaps her fingers
KE and CO are dressing dolls
looks at doll for a bit , then puts it down on ground
snaps her fingers and dances

the girls look up briefly; QU goes to downstairs playhouse after a while; AM picks up dishes and goes to table; KE leaves upstairs; AN fixes her socks and then leaves upstairs; after a minute , KE , QU and AN come back; KE gives CO a sweater for her doll; after a few minutes , QU goes back downstairs; KE wanders around a bit , and AN plays with a doll , sitting down next to CO; AM plays quietly at the table; KE goes to top of steps
comes back and talks to CO and AN , but background noise is overwhelming; AM starts banging dishes on the table
AM stops
KE takes pot away from AM and puts it away
takes pan off wall
hands pan to AM; AM bangs pan on table , then puts plate into pan
AN reaches for pan; AM pulls it out of her reach; KE heads for stairs , meets EL; EL comes up , puts doll on ground where KE is pointing
AN puts baby into cupboard
AN turns around and watches KE and EL; AM gets up and approaches KE and EL
KE , EL and AN go downstairs and leave area
downstairs , EL sees SI across room
KE and AN leave area; EL goes back upstairs; AM and CO are sitting on ground next to each other and playing in parallel; EL watches them
EL then goes downstairs; CO and AM play quietly for a few minutes , then CO goes downstairs; after a while AM goes downstairs
